int cma::CMA_ME_Knowledge::loadConfig ( const char *  fileName  )  [virtual]

Load the configuration file, which is in text format. This file contains the configuration used in morphological analysis, such as part-of-speech configuration, etc.

Parameters:
fileName the file name
Returns:
0 for fail, 1 for success

int cma::CMA_ME_Knowledge::loadPOSModel ( const char *  cateName  )  [virtual]

Load the model file in binary format, which contains statistical information for part-of-speech tagging.

Parameters:
cateName the file name, it include two files, (cateName).model and (cateName).tag. For example, with cateName cate1, "cate1.model" and "cate1.tag" should exists
Returns:
0 for fail, 1 for success

Implements cma::Knowledge.

References cma::POSTable::addPOS(), and cma::POSTable::instance().

int cma::CMA_ME_Knowledge::loadStatModel ( const char *  cateName  )  [virtual]

Load the model file in binary format, which contains statistical information for word segmentation.

Parameters:
cateName the file name, it include two files, (cateName).model and (cateName).tag. For example, with cateName cate1, "cate1.model" and "cate1.tag" should exists
Returns:
0 for fail, 1 for success

Implements cma::Knowledge.

int cma::CMA_ME_Knowledge::loadStopWordDict ( const char *  fileName  )  [virtual]

Load the stop-word dictionary file, which is in text format. The words in this file are ignored in the morphological analysis result.

Parameters:
fileName the file name
Returns:
0 for fail, 1 for success
